name: Magical Rifle Girl Sumire - 魔法ライフル少女すみれ
name_original: Magical Rifle Girl Sumire - 魔法ライフル少女すみれ
description:
Follow the unyielding, rifle-wielding Sumire in this episode of 'Magical Rifle Girl Sumire'! Our heroine is tasked with entering a theatrical, distorted realm where an evil fairy has summoned hundreds of faceless, pirouetting dolls! Armed with her elemental rifle Chekhov, she storms the warped tower and unleashes her powerful magicks upon the ceaseless hordes of fae-willed puppets!

Magical Rifle Girl Sumire is a singleplayer first-person shooter with a focus on high mobility created in 30 days for Reload Magazine Game Jam #2. 

CONTROLS

  • WASD: Move
  • Spacebar: Jump
  • LMB: Fire
  • RMB: Open Ability Wheel
  • E: Use ability
  • F: Interact
  • Q: Coup de Grâce!
  • 1-4: Choose Element

ABILITIES

  • Adagio: Slows time for a few seconds
  • Allegro: Double fire rate for a few seconds
  • Chaînés: Temporary invulnerability
  • Renversé: Loads an explosive round into rifle
  • Coup de Grâce!: Wipe out a whole horde of enemies

ELEMENTS

  • 1 - Earth: Useful against all enemies
  • 2 - Ice: Super effective against yellow Wind Dancers
  • 3 - Fire: Super effective against blue Ice Dancers
  • 4 - Wind: Super effective against red Fire Dancers

CREDITS

  • Emily Garczynski: Character Art & Modeling
  • Brandon Hanabarger: Level and Weapon Design
  • Brian Maresso: Programming and VFX
  • Sydney Michael: Voice Acting
